snippet: Tens of thousands of protesters took to the streets of Macedonia’s capital on Sunday in a dramatic display of ethnic unity against a government under siege.
abstract: Tens of thousands of demonstrators gather in Macedonia to protest government of Prime Min Nikola Gruevski following revelation of wiretapped conversations pointing to government control over journalists, courts and elections.
lead_paragraph: Tens of thousands of protesters took to the streets of Macedonia’s capital on Sunday in a dramatic display of ethnic unity against a government under siege.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Macedonia: Protesters Rally Against Government

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
